item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Small3dlib: Suckless PD 3D software rasterizer (27 points | discuss)

3. I have 2000 old VHS tapes in my garage and don't know what to do with them (141 points | 108 comments)

7. NKRYPT Sculpture (217 points | 8 comments)

15. Octopuses seen hunting together with fish (304 points | 237 comments)

25. U.S. court orders LibGen to pay $30M to publishers, issues broad injunction (285 points | 284 comments)
26. I've tracked every single piece of clothing I've worn for three years (53 points | 67 comments)
27. Our Android app is frozen in carbonite (241 points | 103 comments)

29. Lesser known tricks, quirks and features of C (131 points | 34 comments)
30. DoNotPay has to pay $193K for falsely touting untested AI lawyer, FTC says (268 points | 183 comments)
